title: Video: Låpsley – Station
content:
Seventeen year old Låpsley (Holly Lapsley Fletcher) has been everywhere over the past couple of weeks, since she dropped her newest track, Station.

Now with a video to accompany it, the Liverpudlian teenager is all set for world (blog) domination. Pitch-shifting her own vocals to astonishing effect, landing the track somewhere between Florida wunderkid XXYYXX and Nosaj Thing, this is a very confident few first steps for a mightily exciting new musician. Station reminds me of the first time I heard those initial James Blake EPs, in that Låpsley is pushing boundaries perhaps without even realising it.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
